recipes.title: Citrus Herb Salmon #1
recipes.description: Zesty baked salmon with fresh herbs, perfect for a light dinner.
recipes.ingredients:
4 salmon fillets
2 oranges
1 lemon
Fresh dill
Olive oil
Salt & pepper
recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 200°C
2. Place salmon on parchment
3. Top with citrus slices and herbs
4. Drizzle olive oil
5. Bake for 15 minutes
6. Serve with mixed greens

recipes.title: Caramelized Pork Belly Bites #2
recipes.description: Thịt kho kiểu mới với lớp caramel bóng mượt, ăn cùng cơm nóng.
recipes.ingredients:
600g pork belly
Coconut water
Fish sauce
Brown sugar
Garlic
Shallots
Black pepper
recipes.instructions:
1. Cut pork into cubes
2. Caramelize sugar until amber
3. Add pork and aromatics
4. Pour coconut water, simmer 40 minutes
5. Reduce sauce until glossy
6. Serve with pickled veggies

recipes.title: Thai Mango Sticky Rice #3
recipes.description: Sweet sticky rice infused with coconut milk, served with ripe mango.
recipes.ingredients:
1 cup glutinous rice
1 can coconut milk
4 tbsp sugar
Pinch of salt
2 ripe mangoes
Toasted sesame seeds
recipes.instructions:
1. Steam sticky rice until tender
2. Warm coconut milk with sugar and salt
3. Mix half of coconut sauce with rice
4. Serve rice with sliced mango
5. Drizzle extra sauce and sprinkle sesame seeds

recipes.title: Matcha Tiramisu #4
recipes.description: Japanese twist on the classic tiramisu with earthy matcha flavor.
recipes.ingredients:
Ladyfingers
250g mascarpone
3 eggs
80g sugar
Matcha powder
Milk
White chocolate
recipes.instructions:
1. Separate eggs and whip yolks with sugar
2. Fold in mascarpone
3. Beat egg whites to stiff peaks and fold in
4. Dip ladyfingers in matcha milk
5. Layer with cream
6. Chill 4 hours and dust with matcha

recipes.title: Matcha Tiramisu #5
recipes.description: Japanese twist on the classic tiramisu with earthy matcha flavor.
recipes.ingredients:
Ladyfingers
250g mascarpone
3 eggs
80g sugar
Matcha powder
Milk
White chocolate
recipes.instructions:
1. Separate eggs and whip yolks with sugar
2. Fold in mascarpone
3. Beat egg whites to stiff peaks and fold in
4. Dip ladyfingers in matcha milk
5. Layer with cream
6. Chill 4 hours and dust with matcha

recipes.title: Spicy Lemongrass Chicken #6
recipes.description: Juicy chicken thighs marinated with lemongrass, chili, and fish sauce, then pan-seared until caramelized.
recipes.ingredients:
600g chicken thighs
4 stalks lemongrass
3 tbsp fish sauce
1 tbsp sugar
2 cloves garlic
Fresh chili
Spring onions
recipes.instructions:
1. Mince lemongrass, garlic, and chili
2. Marinate chicken with spices for 30 minutes
3. Heat pan with a bit of oil
4. Sear chicken skin-side down until golden
5. Flip and cook through
6. Garnish with spring onions and serve with rice

recipes.title: Spicy Lemongrass Chicken #7
recipes.description: Juicy chicken thighs marinated with lemongrass, chili, and fish sauce, then pan-seared until caramelized.
recipes.ingredients:
600g chicken thighs
4 stalks lemongrass
3 tbsp fish sauce
1 tbsp sugar
2 cloves garlic
Fresh chili
Spring onions
recipes.instructions:
1. Mince lemongrass, garlic, and chili
2. Marinate chicken with spices for 30 minutes
3. Heat pan with a bit of oil
4. Sear chicken skin-side down until golden
5. Flip and cook through
6. Garnish with spring onions and serve with rice

recipes.title: Roasted Vegetable Buddha Bowl #8
recipes.description: Colorful bowl with roasted veggies, quinoa, and tahini dressing.
recipes.ingredients:
2 cups quinoa
1 sweet potato
1 zucchini
Broccoli florets
Cherry tomatoes
Chickpeas
Tahini dressing
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook quinoa per package
2. Toss veggies with olive oil and roast
3. Roast chickpeas until crispy
4. Assemble bowl with quinoa base
5. Add veggies and drizzle dressing

recipes.title: Miso Ramen with Soft Eggs #9
recipes.description: Comforting miso broth with chewy noodles, charred corn, and jammy eggs.
recipes.ingredients:
Ramen noodles
4 cups chicken broth
Miso paste
Soy sauce
Sesame oil
Corn
Soft-boiled eggs
Green onions
recipes.instructions:
1. Simmer broth with miso and soy
2. Cook noodles separately
3. Char corn in a hot pan
4. Assemble bowl with noodles and broth
5. Top with eggs, corn, and onions

recipes.title: Classic Beef Lasagna #10
recipes.description: Layers of rich meat sauce, creamy béchamel, and mozzarella.
recipes.ingredients:
12 lasagna sheets
500g ground beef
Tomato sauce
Onion
Garlic
Mozzarella
Parmesan
Milk
Butter
Flour
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook beef with onion and garlic
2. Simmer with tomato sauce
3. Prepare béchamel sauce
4. Layer pasta, sauces, and cheese
5. Bake at 190°C for 40 minutes
6. Let rest before slicing

recipes.title: Spicy Lemongrass Chicken #11
recipes.description: Juicy chicken thighs marinated with lemongrass, chili, and fish sauce, then pan-seared until caramelized.
recipes.ingredients:
600g chicken thighs
4 stalks lemongrass
3 tbsp fish sauce
1 tbsp sugar
2 cloves garlic
Fresh chili
Spring onions
recipes.instructions:
1. Mince lemongrass, garlic, and chili
2. Marinate chicken with spices for 30 minutes
3. Heat pan with a bit of oil
4. Sear chicken skin-side down until golden
5. Flip and cook through
6. Garnish with spring onions and serve with rice

recipes.title: Korean BBQ Beef Tacos #12
recipes.description: Tacos filled with bulgogi beef, kimchi slaw, and gochujang crema.
recipes.ingredients:
8 tortillas
400g beef sirloin
Soy sauce
Pear puree
Garlic
Kimchi
Cabbage
Gochujang
Sour cream
recipes.instructions:
1. Marinate beef with soy, pear, garlic
2. Grill beef and slice thinly
3. Toss kimchi with shredded cabbage
4. Mix gochujang with sour cream
5. Assemble tacos and serve immediately

recipes.title: Mediterranean Mezze Platter #29
recipes.description: Assorted dips, roasted veggies, olives, and warm pita.
recipes.ingredients:
Hummus
Baba ghanoush
Roasted peppers
Olives
Cucumber
Cherry tomatoes
Feta
Pita bread
recipes.instructions:
1. Warm pita in oven
2. Arrange dips in bowls
3. Slice veggies and drizzle olive oil
4. Plate everything on large board
5. Garnish with herbs and serve
